directions: Combine the garlic, anchovies, butter, cream cheese, feta cheese, sour cream, chives, hot pepper sauce and pepper in the container of a food processor. Process until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl, and serve with crackers, bread slices, or pita chips.
ingredients: 1 dash hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: To Die For Garlic Feta Pate
